headline: Is Blackstone (BX) Pricing Reflect Long Term Gains Despite Recent Share Price Weakness
summary: If you are wondering whether Blackstone's current share price gives you good value for your money, this article walks through what the numbers are actually saying about the stock. Recently, the share price closed at US$150.48, with returns of 8% decline over 7 days, 3.3% decline over 30 days, 5.2% decline year to date, 16.9% decline over 1 year, but gains of 71.9% over 3 years and 166.2% over 5 years. These moves sit against ongoing interest in large alternative asset managers and how they...
